movie.title: Justice League
movie.description_intro: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes-Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash-it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.
movie.description_full: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes-Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash-it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

movies.title: The Pardon
movies.summary: The true story of Toni Jo Henry, a woman tried for the crime of murder in 1942 in the state of Louisiana. Toni Jo, a product of childhood abuse and neglect, briefly discovers love and happiness that soon turns to despair when her husband Cowboy is sent to prison and she embarks on an ill-fated plan with an accomplice Arkie to free him. Because of her beauty, Toni Jo instantly becomes a notorious celebrity, drawing the unparalleled media attention of two highly publicized and sensational murder trials. Her story is a story of hope, a story of love and a story of redemption, as Toni Jo discovers the true strength within herself and, with the help of a priest, Father Richard is able to face her life with a calm and peace that defies explanation.

movies.title: Duel to the Death
movies.summary: One of the last of the Old School Hong Kong martial arts flicks, this one deals with a legendary competition in swordplay and fighting that ends up being fought between two great warriors, a Chinese man and a Japanese man, who, over the course of the film, have become friends.

movies.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
movies.summary: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.
movies.description_full: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.
movies.synopsis: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.

movies.title: Nineteen Summers
movies.summary: Born in the generational Los Angeles street culture a 19-year-old father seeks a better life in the midst of a turf war.
movies.description_full: Born in the generational Los Angeles street culture a 19-year-old father seeks a better life in the midst of a turf war.
